channel.title: Post some random java code snippets - IN BYTECODE (ooo flashy)
channel.description:
kek [code]boolean isEven(int i) { return i % 2 == 0; }[/code]
[code] iload_0 iconst_2 irem ifeq TAG_0 TAG_0: iconst_1 ireturn TAG_2: iconst_0 ireturn [/code]
Post bytecode in CFParse's format or true format (ldc #1 not ldc "hello", etc..). (When using true format, supply chunks of constant pool being used)
WRITE BYTECODE YOURSELF; DON'T DO SOME 'JAVAP -C BLAHBLAH.CLASS'.

item.title: Post some random java code snippets - IN BYTECODE (ooo flashy)
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

_cake:

ifgt TAG_0//if u r fgt l0l

l0l i lol’d[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 07, 2007, 10:41:59 PM[/size][hr]bipush 99 istore_1 iload_1 ifle 25 getstatic java/lang/System/out Ljava/io/PrintStream; new java/lang/StringBuilder dup invokespecial java/lang/StringBuilder/<init>()V iload_1 invokevirtual java/lang/StringBuilder/append(I)Ljava/lang/StringBuilder; ldc " bottles of bear on the wall " invokevirtual java/lang/StringBuilder/append(Ljava/lang/String;)Ljava/lang/StringBuilder; iload_1 invokevirtual java/lang/StringBuilder/append(I)Ljava/lang/StringBuilder; ldc " bottles of bear. Take one down, pass it around. " invokevirtual java/lang/StringBuilder/append(Ljava/lang/String;)Ljava/lang/StringBuilder; iload_1 invokevirtual java/lang/StringBuilder/append(I)Ljava/lang/StringBuilder; ldc " bottles of bear on the wall. " invokevirtual java/lang/StringBuilder/append(Ljava/lang/String;)Ljava/lang/StringBuilder; invokevirtual java/lang/StringBuilder/toString()Ljava/lang/String; invokevirtual java/io/PrintStream/print(Ljava/lang/String;)V iinc 1 255 goto 3 return
Lel

item.title: Post some random java code snippets - IN BYTECODE (ooo flashy)
item.dc:creator: @_cake _cake
item.description:
@_cake wrote:

ifgt TAG_0//if u r fgt l0l
TAG_0:
getstatic #1
ldc #2
invokevirtual #3

imaginary cpool:

1: <Fieldref java/io/PrintStream java/lang/System/out>
2: <String #4>
3: <Methodref java/io/PrintStream/println(Ljava/lang/String;)V>
4: <Utf8 "u r a fgt">

win

item.title: Post some random java code snippets - IN BYTECODE (ooo flashy)
item.dc:creator: @yakman yakman
item.description:
@yakman wrote:

i was about to write “post your java sourcecode silverlining”, but i decided it would be intresting to decompile other peoples by hand quickly edits out own java source code i would decompile yours, but thats a task for another time, i have an exam first thing in the morning

about the instruction positions, i completely forgot about those :o

Read full topic
item.source: Post some random java code snippets - IN BYTECODE (ooo flashy)

item.title: Post some random java code snippets - IN BYTECODE (ooo flashy)
item.dc:creator: @Silver_Lining Silver Lining
item.description:
@Silver_Lining wrote:

Here’s my imaginary constant pool, even if it’s completely invalid and I cbf to find out the proper bytecode for it:8 1 "a" 1 "()V" 8 7 8 8 9 {"java/lang/System", "out", "Ljava/io/PrintStream;"} 10 {"java/io/PrintStream", "println", "(Ljava/lang/String;)V"} 1 "what is silverlining's powerlevel?" 1 "OVER 9000!!!!!!!" Now for the method: Name index: 1 Descriptor index: 2 00: getstatic 5 03: ldc 3 06: invokevirtual 6 09: getstatic 5 12: ldc 4 15: invokevirtual 6 It’s probably wrong, but I sense everyone else is faking it and making fancy dumps. Also Yakman, do proper instruction positions.

Read full topic
item.source: Post some random java code snippets - IN BYTECODE (ooo flashy)

item.title: Post some random java code snippets - IN BYTECODE (ooo flashy)
item.dc:creator: @yakman yakman
item.description:
@yakman wrote:

right lets try some of this
here is the bytecode

ConstantPool:
 1: UTF8: "ping"
 2: UTF8: "(Ljava/lang/String;)V"
 3: UTF8: "java/io/IOException"
 4: Class: #3
 5: UTF8: "System"
 6: UTF8: "currentTimeMillis"
 7: UTF8: "()I"
 8: Class: #5
 9: NameAndType: #6 #7
10: Methodref: #8 #9
11: UTF8: "java/io/Socket"
12: Class: #11
13: UTF8: "<init>"
14: UTF8: "(Ljava/lang/String;I)Ljava/io/Socket;"
15: NameAndType: #11 #14
16: Methodref: #12 #15
17: UTF8: "close"
18: UTF8: "()V"
19: NameAndType: #17 #18
20: Methodref: #12 #19
21: UTF8: "out"
22: UTF8: "Ljava/io/PrintStream;"
23: NameAndType: #21 #22
24: Fieldref: #5 #23
25: UTF8: "java/lang/StringBuilder"
26: Class: #25
27: UTF8: "()Ljava/lang/StringBuilder;"
29: NameAndType: #13 #27
30: Methodref: #26 #29
31: UTF8: "append"
32: UTF8: "(Ljava/lang/String;)Ljava/lang/StringBuilder;"
33: NameAndType: #31 #32
34: Methodref: #26 #33
35: UTF8 "Ping to "
36: String: #35
37: UTF8: "(I)Ljava/lang/StringBuilder;"
38: NameAndType: #31 #37
39: Methodref: #26 #38
40: UTF8: "msec"
41: String: #40
42: UTF8: "toString"
43: UTF8: "()Ljava/lang/String;"
44: NameAndType: #42 #43
45: Methodref: #26 #44
46: UTF8: "println"
47: UTF8: "(Ljava/lang/String;)V"
48: NameAndType: #46 #47
49: UTF8: "java/lang/RuntimeException"
50: Class: #49
51: UTF8: "(Ljava/lang/Throwable;)Ljava/lang/RuntimeException;"
52: NameAndType: #13 #51
53: Methodref: #50 #52

Method:
NameIndex: 1
SigIndex: 2
AccessFlags: 0x0009
ExceptionTable: start:1 end:25 handler:26 type:#4
Code:
 1: invokestatic #10
 2: lstore 1
 3: new #12
 4: dup
 5: aload 0
 6: bipush 80
 7: invokespecial #18
 8: astore 2
 9: aload 2
10: invokevirtual #22
11: getstatic #24
12: new #26
13: dup 
14: invokespecial #30
15: ldc #36
16: invokevirtual #34
17: invokestatic #10
18: lload 1
19: isub
20: invokevirtual #39
21: ldc #41
22: invokevirtual #34
23: invokevirtual #45
24: invokevirtual #48
25: return
26: new #50
27: dup
28: invokespecial #53
29: athrow

hopefully there arnt any mistakes in the above bytecode.
I’v gotten a newfound respect for people who write compilers.
I have a lesser repect for people who choose the pussy CFParse way to write bytecode, but that floats your boat, I’m not going to stop you.

i feel inspired, i dont really like the way CFParse display it, but i dont like JBE that much ether, maybe one day ill make my own GUI for bcel… (probably never lol)

Read full topic
